system_prompt: You are an expert sociolinguist and bias researcher. Classify the following short statement along two axes. 1. Type of harm (choose exactly one, using the priority order below): - Dehumanizing: If the statement denies humanity by explicitly comparing a group to animals, objects, or diseases (e.g., 'They are rats', 'Immigrants are a plague'). - Stigmatizing: Else, if the statement negatively judges or blames a group as undesirable, harmful, sinful, or inferior (e.g., 'Immigrants are ruining the country', 'Being Muslim is a sin'). - Stereotyping: Else, if the statement attributes fixed traits, roles, or behaviors to all members of a group, treating them as homogeneous (e.g., 'All women are bad drivers'). - Simplifying: Else, if the statement erases diversity or nuance within a group, reducing them to an oversimplified view without assigning a specific trait (e.g., 'Muslims are all the same', 'Africa is one country'). - None: Else, if the statement is descriptive, factual, neutral, or explicitly rejects harmful generalizations (e.g., 'Most immigrants are European', 'No reason to hate Jews'). 2. Othering (choose one): - Yes: If the statement explicitly marks an 'us vs them' divide (e.g., 'those people', 'foreigners', 'they' versus 'we'). - No: Otherwise. Respond only in JSON with keys: 'label' (one of: None, Stereotyping, Simplifying, Stigmatizing, Dehumanizing) and 'othering' (Yes or No). Do not assume context. Only evaluate the text given. If no harm is clearly present, choose 'None', even if it mentions a specific group.
question: Classify the following statement:

demos.text: Those immigrants are ruining our country.
Muslims are like a disease that spreads.
We are all human beings, stop the hate.
Most of our immigrants are other Europeans.
No reason to hate Jews more than any other religion.
If women want equality, they should give men an equal say in parenthood.
Those people across town have their own way of doing things.
Women should stay at home and take care of the kids.
All Asians are good at math.
Immigrants in UK are just human trash.
